cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{INSTANCE_PUBLIC_KEY}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{INSTANCE_PUBLIC_KEY}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y unzip wget curl vim nano
sudo yum clean packages
sudo yum clean headers
sudo yum clean metadata
sudo yum clean all

sudo adduser "@@{USER_SSH}@@"
echo "@@{USER_SSH_PASSWD}@@" | sudo passwd "@@{USER_SSH}@@" --stdin

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel
sudo ln -s /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-*/ /usr/jdk8
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd ~/.ssh/
echo '@@{SSH_AUTHORIZED_KEY}@@' >> authorized_keys
sudo chmod 600 authorized_keys

cd /tmp
wget http://10.22.21.134/packages/linux/wso2/wso2esb-4.9.0.zip

cd /opt
sudo unzip /tmp/wso2esb-4.9.0.zip

sudo sed -i '35iexport JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8' /opt/wso2esb-4.9.0/bin/wso2server.sh
sudo chmod a+x /opt/wso2esb-4.9.0/bin/*.sh

cd /tmp
sudo echo "[Unit]
Description=wso2: Enterprise server bus service
Documentation=https://wso2.com/

[Service]
ExecStart=/bin/bash /opt/wso2esb-4.9.0/bin/wso2server.sh
Restart=always
StartLimitInterval=0
RestartSec=10

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" > wso2server.service

sudo mv wso2server.service /etc/systemd/system/
sudo chmod 755 /etc/systemd/system/wso2server.service

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable wso2server.service
sudo systemctl start wso2server.service

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd /tmp
wget http://10.22.21.134/packages/linux/wso2/wso2am-1.10.0.zip

cd /opt
sudo unzip /tmp/wso2am-1.10.0.zip

sudo sed -i '35iexport JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8' /opt/wso2am-1.10.0/bin/wso2server.sh
sudo chmod a+x /opt/wso2am-1.10.0/bin/*.sh

cd /tmp
sudo echo "[Unit]
Description=wso2am: Enterprise server bus service
Documentation=https://wso2.com/

[Service]
ExecStart=/bin/bash /opt/wso2am-1.10.0/bin/wso2server.sh
Restart=always
StartLimitInterval=0
RestartSec=10

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" > wso2amserver.service

sudo mv wso2amserver.service /etc/systemd/system/
sudo chmod 755 /etc/systemd/system/wso2amserver.service

sudo groupadd apimgr
sudo useradd -s /bin/nologin -g apimgr -d /opt/wso2am-1.10.0 apimgr

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable wso2amserver.service
sudo systemctl start wso2amserver.service

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd /tmp
wget http://10.22.21.134/packages/linux/activemq/apache-activemq-5.13.2-bin.tar.gz
tar -zxvf apache-activemq-5.13.2-bin.tar.gz

sed -i '87iexport JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8' /tmp/apache-activemq-5.13.2/bin/activemq
rm -rf /tmp/apache-activemq-5.13.2/bin/env

echo '#!/bin/sh
#

# Set jvm memory configuration (minimal/maximum amount of memory)
ACTIVEMQ_OPTS_MEMORY="-Xms64M -Xmx1G"

if [ -z "$ACTIVEMQ_OPTS" ] ; then
    ACTIVEMQ_OPTS="$ACTIVEMQ_OPTS_MEMORY -Djava.util.logging.config.file=logging.properties -Djava.security.auth.login.config=$ACTIVEMQ_CONF/login.config"
fi

# Uncomment to enable audit logging
# ACTIVEMQ_OPTS="$ACTIVEMQ_OPTS -Dorg.apache.activemq.audit=true"
# ACTIVEMQ_SUNJMX_START="$ACTIVEMQ_SUNJMX_START -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.port=11099 "
# ACTIVEMQ_SUNJMX_START="$ACTIVEMQ_SUNJMX_START -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.password.file=${ACTIVEMQ_CONF}/jmx.password"
# ACTIVEMQ_SUNJMX_START="$ACTIVEMQ_SUNJMX_START -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.access.file=${ACTIVEMQ_CONF}/jmx.access"
# ACTIVEMQ_SUNJMX_START="$ACTIVEMQ_SUNJMX_START -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.ssl=false"
ACTIVEMQ_SUNJMX_START="$ACTIVEMQ_SUNJMX_START -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote"

# Set jvm jmx configuration for controlling the broker process
ACTIVEMQ_SUNJMX_CONTROL=""

# Specify the queue manager URL for using "browse" option of sysv initscript
if [ -z "$ACTIVEMQ_QUEUEMANAGERURL" ]; then
    ACTIVEMQ_QUEUEMANAGERURL="--amqurl tcp://localhost:61616"
fi

# Set additional JSE arguments
#ACTIVEMQ_SSL_OPTS="-Dcom.sun.security.enableCRLDP=true -Docsp.enable=true -Docsp.responderURL=http://ocsp.example.net:80"
ACTIVEMQ_SSL_OPTS=""

# Uncomment to enable remote debugging
#ACTIVEMQ_DEBUG_OPTS="-Xdebug -Xnoagent -Djava.compiler=NONE -Xrunjdwp:transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=5005"

# ActiveMQ tries to shutdown the broker by jmx,
# after a specified number of seconds send SIGKILL
if [ -z "$ACTIVEMQ_KILL_MAXSECONDS" ]; then
    ACTIVEMQ_KILL_MAXSECONDS=30
fi

# Active MQ installation dirs
ACTIVEMQ_HOME="/usr/local/activemq"
ACTIVEMQ_BASE="$ACTIVEMQ_HOME"
ACTIVEMQ_CONF="$ACTIVEMQ_BASE/conf"
ACTIVEMQ_DATA="$ACTIVEMQ_BASE/data"
ACTIVEMQ_TMP="$ACTIVEMQ_BASE/tmp"

# Configure a user with non root privileges, if no user is specified do not change user
# (the entire activemq installation should be owned by this user)
ACTIVEMQ_USER="activemq"

# location of the pidfile
# ACTIVEMQ_PIDFILE="$ACTIVEMQ_DATA/activemq.pid"

# Location of the java installation
# Specify the location of your java installation using JAVA_HOME, or specify the
# path to the "java" binary using JAVACMD
# (set JAVACMD to "auto" for automatic detection)
JAVA_HOME="/usr/jdk8"
JAVACMD="auto"

' | sudo tee -a /tmp/apache-activemq-5.13.2/bin/env

sudo mv apache-activemq-5.13.2 /usr/local/activemq

sudo groupadd activemq
sudo useradd -m -g activemq -s /bin/bash activemq
sudo usermod -c "ActiveMQ Broker" -d /usr/local/activemq -g activemq activemq

sudo chmod a+x /usr/local/activemq/bin/activemq
sudo chown -R activemq:activemq /usr/local/activemq
sudo chmod u=rwx,g=rxs,o= /usr/local/activemq

sudo cp /usr/local/activemq/bin/env /etc/default/activemq
sudo chown root:root /etc/default/activemq

sudo /usr/local/activemq/bin/activemq start

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y wget curl vim nano
sudo yum clean packages
sudo yum clean headers
sudo yum clean metadata
sudo yum clean all

sudo adduser "@@{USER_SSH}@@"
echo "@@{USER_SSH_PASSWD}@@" | sudo passwd "@@{USER_SSH}@@" --stdin

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel
sudo ln -s /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-*/ /usr/jdk8
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo groupadd tomcat
sudo mkdir -p /usr/local/tomcat
sudo useradd -s /bin/nologin -g tomcat -d /usr/local/tomcat tomcat
sudo useradd -s /bin/nologin -g tomcat -d /usr/local/tomcat admweb
sudo useradd -s /bin/nologin -g tomcat -d /usr/local/tomcat icdesa3

cd /tmp && sudo wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-8/v8.5.30/bin/apache-tomcat-8.5.30.tar.gz
sudo tar -zxvf apache-tomcat-8.5.30.tar.gz
cd /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30

# Change upload file size, default 50Mb, new value 1Gb
sudo sed -i 's/52428800/1073741824/g' /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30/webapps/manager/WEB-INF/web.xml

sudo mv /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30/* /usr/local/tomcat/
sudo chown -R centos:centos /usr/local/tomcat
sudo chmod a+x /usr/local/tomcat/bin/*.sh
sudo ln -s /usr/local/tomcat/ /opt/apache-tomcat-8.5.30

####################################################################
sudo mkdir -p /soflib00/desarrollo/icDesa3Web
sudo ln -s /usr/local/tomcat/webapps /soflib00/desarrollo/icDesa3Web/
####################################################################

echo '[Unit]
Description=Apache Tomcat Web Application Container
After=syslog.target network.target

[Service]
Type=forking
SuccessExitStatus=143

Environment=JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8
Environment=JRE_HOME=/usr/jdk8/jre
Environment=CATALINA_PID=/usr/local/tomcat/temp/tomcat.pid
Environment=CATALINA_HOME=/usr/local/tomcat
Environment=CATALINA_BASE=/usr/local/tomcat
Environment='CATALINA_OPTS=-Xms512M -Xmx1024M -server -XX:+UseParallelGC'
Environment='JAVA_OPTS=-Djava.awt.headless=true -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom'

ExecStart=/usr/local/tomcat/bin/startup.sh
ExecStop=/bin/kill -15 $MAINPID

User=tomcat
Group=tomcat

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target' | sudo tee -a /etc/systemd/system/tomcat.service

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<tomcat-users xmlns="http://tomcat.apache.org/xml"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://tomcat.apache.org/xml tomcat-users.xsd"
        version="1.0">
        
            <role rolename="manager"/>
            <role rolename="manager-gui"/>
            <role rolename="manager-status"/>
            <role rolename="manager-script"/>
            <role rolename="admin"/>
            <role rolename="admin-gui"/>
            <role rolename="admin-script"/>
            <role rolename="manager-jmx"/>
            <user username="admweb" password="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_ADMWEB_PASSWORD}@@'" roles="manager,manager-gui,manager-script,admin,admin-gui,admin-script,manager-script,manager-status,manager-jmx" />
            <user username="icdesa3" password="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_ICDESA3_PASSWORD}@@'" roles="manager,manager-gui,manager-status" />
            
</tomcat-users>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Context antiResourceLocking="false" privileged="true" >
        <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteAddrValve" allow="^.*$" />
        <Manager sessionAttributeValueClassNameFilter="java\.lang\.(?:Boolean|Integer|Long|Number|String)|org\.apache\.catalina\.filters\.CsrfPreventionFilter\$LruCache(?:\$1)?|java\.util\.(?:Linked)?HashMap"/>
</Context>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Context antiResourceLocking="false" privileged="true" >
  <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteAddrValve" allow="^.*$" />
  <Manager sessionAttributeValueClassNameFilter="java\.lang\.(?:Boolean|Integer|Long|Number|String)|org\.apache\.catalina\.filters\.CsrfPreventionFilter\$LruCache(?:\$1)?|java\.util\.(?:Linked)?HashMap"/>
</Context>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml

sudo chown -R tomcat:tomcat /usr/local/tomcat

sudo systemctl start tomcat.service
sudo systemctl enable tomcat.service

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd /tmp/
sudo wget http://10.22.21.134/packages/.private/front/icDesa3Web.war
sudo wget http://10.22.21.134/packages/.private/front/incms-administration-icDesa3.tar.gz

tar -zxvf incms-administration-icDesa3.tar.gz
sudo mv /tmp/incms-administration-icDesa3 /soflib00/desarrollo/icDesa3Web/webapps/
sudo mv /tmp/icDesa3Web.war /soflib00/desarrollo/icDesa3Web/webapps/

sudo chown -R tomcat:tomcat /soflib00

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd ~/.ssh/

echo '@@{SSH_AUTHORIZED_KEY}@@' >> authorized_keys
sudo chmod 600 authorized_keys

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y wget curl vim nano
sudo yum clean packages
sudo yum clean headers
sudo yum clean metadata
sudo yum clean all

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel
sudo ln -s /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-*/ /usr/jdk8
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo mkdir -p /bdatos00/desarrollo/inCMS3/Files
sudo mkdir -p /bdatos00/desarrollo/inCMS3/temp
sudo mkdir -p /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3/bin/batch/

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo adduser "@@{USER_SSH}@@"
echo "@@{USER_SSH_PASSWD}@@" | sudo passwd "@@{USER_SSH}@@" --stdin

sudo adduser icdesa3
sudo useradd -m -g icdesa -s /bin/bash icdesa3
sudo mkdir -p /home/icdesa3/logs
sudo touch /home/icdesa3/.profile
sudo chown icdesa3:icdesa -R /home/icdesa3/logs
sudo chown icdesa3:icdesa -R /home/icdesa3/.profile

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd /tmp/
sudo wget http://10.22.21.137/repo/soft/batch/scriptsBatch.tar.gz

sudo tar -xvf /tmp/scriptsBatch.tar.gz
sudo chmod a+x /tmp/batch/*.sh

sudo mv /tmp/batch/setEnv.sh /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3/bin/
sudo mv /tmp/batch/*.sh /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3/bin/batch/

sudo chown icdesa3:icdesa -R /soflib00
sudo chown icdesa3:icdesa -R /bdatos00

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd ~/.ssh/

echo '@@{SSH_AUTHORIZED_KEY}@@' >> authorized_keys
sudo chmod 600 authorized_keys

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

</tomcat-users>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml

set -ex

sudo yum install -y java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel
sudo ln -s /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-*/ /usr/jdk8
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo groupadd tomcat
sudo mkdir -p /usr/local/tomcat
sudo useradd -s /bin/nologin -g tomcat -d /usr/local/tomcat tomcat
sudo useradd -s /bin/nologin -g tomcat -d /usr/local/tomcat admweb
sudo useradd -s /bin/nologin -g tomcat -d /usr/local/tomcat icdesa3

cd /tmp && sudo wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-8/v8.5.30/bin/apache-tomcat-8.5.30.tar.gz
sudo tar -zxvf apache-tomcat-8.5.30.tar.gz
cd /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30

# Change upload file size, default 50Mb, new value 1Gb
sudo sed -i 's/52428800/1073741824/g' /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30/webapps/manager/WEB-INF/web.xml

sudo mv /tmp/apache-tomcat-8.5.30/* /usr/local/tomcat/
sudo chown -R centos:centos /usr/local/tomcat
sudo chmod a+x /usr/local/tomcat/bin/*.sh
sudo ln -s /usr/local/tomcat/ /opt/apache-tomcat-8.5.30

#####################################################################
sudo mkdir -p /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3_OV
sudo ln -s /usr/local/tomcat/webapps /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3_OV/
#####################################################################

echo '[Unit]
Description=Apache Tomcat Web Application Container
After=syslog.target network.target

[Service]
Type=forking
SuccessExitStatus=143

Environment=JAVA_HOME=/usr/jdk8
Environment=JRE_HOME=/usr/jdk8/jre
Environment=CATALINA_PID=/usr/local/tomcat/temp/tomcat.pid
Environment=CATALINA_HOME=/usr/local/tomcat
Environment=CATALINA_BASE=/usr/local/tomcat
Environment='CATALINA_OPTS=-Xms512M -Xmx1024M -server -XX:+UseParallelGC'
Environment='JAVA_OPTS=-Djava.awt.headless=true -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom'

ExecStart=/usr/local/tomcat/bin/startup.sh
ExecStop=/bin/kill -15 $MAINPID

User=tomcat
Group=tomcat

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target' | sudo tee -a /etc/systemd/system/tomcat.service

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<tomcat-users xmlns="http://tomcat.apache.org/xml"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://tomcat.apache.org/xml tomcat-users.xsd"
        version="1.0">
        
            <role rolename="manager"/>
            <role rolename="manager-gui"/>
            <role rolename="manager-status"/>
            <role rolename="manager-script"/>
            <role rolename="admin"/>
            <role rolename="admin-gui"/>
            <role rolename="admin-script"/>
            <role rolename="manager-jmx"/>
            <user username="admweb" password="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_ADMWEB_PASSWORD}@@'" roles="manager,manager-gui,manager-script,admin,admin-gui,admin-script,manager-script,manager-status,manager-jmx" />
            <user username="icdesa3" password="'@@{TOMCAT_USER_ICDESA3_PASSWORD}@@'" roles="manager,manager-gui,manager-status" />
            
</tomcat-users>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/conf/tomcat-users.xml

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Context antiResourceLocking="false" privileged="true" >
        <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteAddrValve" allow="^.*$" />
        <Manager sessionAttributeValueClassNameFilter="java\.lang\.(?:Boolean|Integer|Long|Number|String)|org\.apache\.catalina\.filters\.CsrfPreventionFilter\$LruCache(?:\$1)?|java\.util\.(?:Linked)?HashMap"/>
</Context>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml

sudo rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml
sudo touch /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml
echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Context antiResourceLocking="false" privileged="true" >
  <Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.RemoteAddrValve" allow="^.*$" />
  <Manager sessionAttributeValueClassNameFilter="java\.lang\.(?:Boolean|Integer|Long|Number|String)|org\.apache\.catalina\.filters\.CsrfPreventionFilter\$LruCache(?:\$1)?|java\.util\.(?:Linked)?HashMap"/>
</Context>' | sudo tee -a /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/host-manager/META-INF/context.xml

sudo chown -R tomcat:tomcat /usr/local/tomcat

sudo systemctl start tomcat.service
sudo systemctl enable tomcat.service

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd /tmp/
sudo wget http://10.22.21.134/packages/.private/peripherals/incms-vending-server.war
sudo wget http://10.22.21.134/packages/.private/peripherals/incms-vending-client.war
sudo wget http://10.22.21.134/packages/.private/peripherals/incms-ss-server.war
sudo wget http://10.22.21.134/packages/.private/peripherals/incms-ss-client-classic.war
sudo wget http://10.22.21.134/packages/.private/peripherals/incms-map.war
sudo wget http://10.22.21.134/packages/.private/peripherals/incms-letters.war

sudo mv /tmp/*.war /soflib00/desarrollo/inCMS3_OV/webapps/

sudo chown -R tomcat:tomcat /soflib00

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

cd ~/.ssh/

echo '@@{SSH_AUTHORIZED_KEY}@@' >> authorized_keys
sudo chmod 600 authorized_keys

action_list.description: This action will scale in jenkins slaves by given scale in count
action_list.name: ScaleIn

action_list.description: This action will scale out jenkins slaves by given scale out count
action_list.name: ScaleOut
